text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Wh-wha? When did I…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: …Rice Shower.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah… Bourbon…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: So this is what defeat feels like.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Frustration at failing to complete one's task. And there is another 
emotion too, one that burns…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: …Rice Shower, this victory is yours.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I… I won?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: You ran tremendously.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Next time, I'll be a more formidable opponent. I hope to race you 
again, Rice Shower.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Me… me too!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I really did it… I really won…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I did it! McQueen! You guys! Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Aww yeah, that's our Rice! She really brought back the W!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: She did! We couldn't have hoped for more!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Look, she's coming to the stands! Let's all call out to her! On three—

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: I dunno, this is kinda disappointing.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: …Huh?

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. Here I was thinking I'd get to see the birth of an undefeated 
Triple Crown legend.

There are more than just a couple of comments like that. We were just 
too busy celebrating to notice until now.
So this is what McQueen meant…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
My true concern was what would happen should she deny the Triple 
Crown so many were hoping to see.

The ambivalent mood enveloping the racecourse seems to stifle our 
cries of joy.

The ambivalent mood enveloping the racecourse seems to stifle our 
cries of joy.
